name: The Eyebroadening
description:
Play as a revengeful katana wielding warrior in this NES-inspired platformer.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a high school project I'm working on, it's not very good yet, so any advice is welcome. :)

I've been developing it since July of 2022 as my first ever game project.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

- WASD/ Arrow keys / Joystick / D-Pad => Movement / Camera

- Space / B => Jump

- Escape / + => Pause

- Left Shift / L => Crouch

- m / Y => Katana / Menu Selection

- n / ZR => Dash (disabled in version 0.4.0)

- b / ZL (airborne) => Float
